bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of stools outflow and incontinence brought forth by harm caused by cold and yang depletion with cold in the depots. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 40: 治冷滑，下痢不禁， 虛羸，縮砂丸方 , “Recipe for pills with suo sha to cure cold smoothness , discharge with free-flux illness and incontinence, as well as depletion with emaciation”.

② Pharmacological Quality of substances of a cold nature and a smoothing and disinhibiting effect on stools and urination. Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 Substance Entry luo kui 落葵：葉惟可蒸鮓，性冷滑 , “The leaves can be steamed to be prepared as vegetables with salted ground rice and other condiments. Their nature is cold [and] smoothening ”.
